pages.title: Gauntlet
pages.text: Level: <level_t2>$(br2)Spawns in the $(copy:Gauntlet Arena)Gauntlet Arena$()[$(copy:bosses_of_mass_destruction:gauntlet_arena)bosses_of_mass_destruction:gauntlet_arena$()].$(br)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Nether$() using $(mage/spell#locate)Mana Locate$().$(br2)Break the $(key)Ancient Chiseled Blackstone$() in the center of the arena to summon the $(key)Gauntlet$().
